title: World Athletics Championships 2025: Thiam out of heptathlon, men’s 800m final and more – live
summary: Luke McLaughlin reports on night eight in Tokyo, highlighting events in the decathlon and heptathlon. The evening also features thrilling relay races. Stay tuned for the latest updates on the competitions.

title: Liverpool v Everton: Premier League – live
summary: Liverpool aims to uphold their flawless league record in the highly anticipated Merseyside derby. The match is set to be closely followed, with Barry Glendenning providing live updates. Fans eagerly await the outcome as the rivalry intensifies.

title: Brisbane beat Collingwood: AFL 2025 first preliminary final – as it happened
summary: The Lions secured a spot in their third consecutive grand final by defeating the Magpies by 29 points in a preliminary final at the MCG. This victory highlights the Lions' strong performance throughout the season. Their momentum continues as they aim for a championship title.

title: Merseyside derby buildup, Manchester United v Chelsea and more – matchday live
summary: Emillia Hawkins will provide coverage, insights, and preparation for today's key football matches. Tune in for in-depth analysis and updates leading up to the games. Stay informed on all the latest developments in the world of football.

title: Poland scrambles aircraft as Russia attacks Ukraine with hundreds of drones and missiles – Europe live
summary: Poland scrambled its aircraft to safeguard its airspace amid escalating tensions. This response follows a report from Ukraine about a significant Russian attack involving over 600 drones and missiles. The situation underscores the ongoing conflict and the heightened alert among neighboring nations.
